title: Hydrothermally synthesized biofunctional ceria nanoparticles using orange peel extract: optimization, characterization, and antibacterial and antioxidant properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19096-19105
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02027H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pegah Mohammadi, Maliheh Yaghoobi, Elnaz Keshavarz Bahaghighat, Fatemeh Asjadi
The compounds of orange peel extract attach to the surface of the synthesized nanoparticles, enhancing the antibacterial and antioxidant activities of the nanoparticles. However, these activities decrease with heat treatment.
